entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
